comments.comment:
This issue doesn't have enough information to determine if there are any mis-configurations or errors. If you see poor performance then you'll need to answer a few things:
Is the data already cached in Alluxio? Which UFS are you using? If you aren't using a cloud-based UFS like AWS S3, is the data in the UFS co-located with Alluxio or in a separate remote cluster somewhere?
You also should share:
alluxio-site.properties Your cluster architecture Look for any errors in the master.log, job_master.log, worker.log, or job_worker.log` and share them here. The exact benchmark workload that is being run. The information about your script you provided doesn't tell us much about what kind of workload you're actually running.
